Description: Equisetidae is often recovered as sister to Ophioglossidae in plastid datasets [@nitta2022open], but sister to all other ferns in nuclear datasets [@qi2018wellresolved; @shen2018largescale]

Marattidae is sister to leptosporangiate ferns in plastid datasets [@nitta2022open], but sometimes resolved as sister to Ophioglossidae in nuclear genomic or transcriptomic datasets [@shen2018largescale; Sessa et al. unpub.]

Some transcriptomic analyses have recovered Hymenophyllaceae sister to Gleicheniaceae [@qi2018wellresolved; @shen2018largescale; Sessa et al. unpub] but it is sister to leptosporangiate ferns excluding Osmundales in plastid datasets [@nitta2022open]
